works.description:
I am contacting you on behalf of the Greek  
Distribution company "VICTORY MEDIA S.A.", which is situated in Athens -  
Greece (23 Marathonos Ave & 2 Markou Botsari Str, 153 44 Gerakas, Athens,  
Greece) in order to report a severe and continuous copyright infringement.



I hereby confirm that the videos identified below infringe our company's  
exclusive exploitation/ distribution rights. Victory Media S.A's copyright  
applies to Greece. The infringing videos concern episodes of the Turkish TV  
Series entitled "Ask Ve Ceza" (in Greek: Έρωτας και τιμωρία) and the Series  
Suleiman the Magnificent (in Greek: Σουλεϊμάν ο Μεγαλοπρεπής) which have  
been illegally uploaded and broadcasted via the following URL’s.





The exploitation/ distribution rights of material carriers (VIDEO/DVD/VCD)  
embodying episodes of the Turkish TV Series "Ask Ve Ceza" (in Greek: Έρωτας  
και τιμωρία) and the Series Suleiman the Magnificent (in Greek: Σουλεϊμάν ο  
Μεγαλοπρεπής), for the territory of Greece, belong exclusively to our  
company(Victory Media S.A.), which never authorized such an uploading/  
broadcasting of the videos by which our company suffers huge financial and  
moral damages.
Victory Media is the exclusive right holder, for the territory of Greece,  
of exploitation/ distribution rights of material carriers (VIDEO/DVD/VCD)  
embodying all 124 episodes of the Turkish Television Series "Ask Ve  
Ceza"(in Greek: Έρωτας και τιμωρία) and the Series Suleiman the Magnificent  
(in Greek: Σουλεϊμάν ο Μεγαλοπρεπής).


We therefore, call upon you to REMOVE the infringing videos and to desist  
in the future from uploading and broadcasting any of the episodes of the TV  
Series "Ask Ve Ceza" (in Greek: Έρωτας και τιμωρία) and the Series Suleiman  
the Magnificent (in Greek: Σουλεϊμάν ο Μεγαλοπρεπής) our e-mail address is  
vic@victorymedia.gr .
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described  
above is not authorized by VICTORY MEDIA S.A., which is the legitimate  
right holder and is not permitted by law.
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information contained in this  
notification is accurate and that VICTORY MEDIA S.A. has an exclusive right  
in law to bring infringement proceedings in respect of its use.

For "VICTORY MEDIA S.A"

_____________________
